mapper.select: SELECT `no`, seq, usedDate, category, customer, usedPlace, price, note, memberId, registeredDate, modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS `no`, seq, usedDate, category, customer, usedPlace, price, note, memberId, registeredDate, modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 AS `no`) R, ( SELECT seq, usedDate, category, customer, usedPlace, price, note, memberId, DATE_FORMAT(registeredDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registeredDate, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifiedDate FROM oms_corp_moneybook WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND usedDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY ${sort} ${order} ) T ) T1 WHERE `no` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE `oms_corp_moneybook` SET usedDate = #{usedDate}, category = #{category}, customer = #{customer}, usedPlace = #{usedPlace}, price = #{price}, note = #{note}, modifiedDate = SYSDATE() WHERE seq = #{seq} AND memberId = #{memberId}
